name: Nystatin
indications:
Nystatin Cream, USP is indicated in the treatment of cutaneous or mucocutaneous mycotic infections caused by 
       
 
  Candida albicans and other susceptible 
       
 
  Candida species. 
       
 
  
                     
                     This cream is not indicated for systemic, oral, intravaginal or ophthalmic use.
contraindications:
Adults and Pediatric Patients (Neonates and Older) 
                     
                     Apply liberally to affected areas twice daily or as indicated until healing is complete.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Product:    50090-3772
                  NDC:    50090-3772-0   30 g in a TUBE   /  1  in a  CARTON
adverseReactions: Nystatin cream is contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of its components.
